Job Description: Job Description    You will be contributing to real decisions about technology to create maintainable solutions for our customer and participating in a highly collaborative group of software engineering professional s. Learning, developing your skills and becoming a rounded Developer in the process.    You will develop software to meet our clients user needs using C#/.Net, often on the Microsoft Azure Cloud, follow best practice guidelines and help to improve those guidelines. You will be creating best in class documentation with our client users in mind.   Qualifications   Must-have criteria:     Current .Net and C# development experience      Experience in working in Azure development Experience      Ability to work with and be customer-facing      Desire to learn new skills      Experience of working in a Scrum Team and an Agile environment      GIT Source Control      Passionate about technologies.      Strong Communication, Good team player, Strong focus on best practices.     Preferred criteria:     Work placement or working experience in Software development      Experience of RESTful services      Customer-facing experience in a professional environment      Cloud application or Cloud solutions development experience      Experience in UI      Microsoft Azure Cloud experience
